description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，曾任原国家语言文字工作委员会机关党委书记、1986年全国语言文字工作会议副秘书长。退休后专注撰写政论，批判否定中国特色社会主义的舆论。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party, he served as the Party Committee Secretary of the former State Language Commission and the Deputy Secretary-General of the 1986 National Conference on Language and Script Work. After retirement, he focused on writing political treatises, criticizing opinions that negated Socialism with Chinese characteristics.
